comments.commentBody:
Results Party:

$1.5 Trillion deficit
10% Unemployment
20% underemployment
Record home foreclosures
Health care debacle that increases prices and decreases services

Those aren’t exactly the kind of results I'd be eager to campaign on.

The governor of Arizona wrote two letters to President Obama about the increased violence on the border. Obama Never replied to either of her letters.
She asked for help and was ignored. So she did what any leader would do,move to protect her citizens. All these racism charges are nonsense.

Charlie Crist did not leave the Republican Party . They left him. Gov. Crist is a good honest man who got things done. That is why he is a very popular leader in Florida.
But Crist did not know that hugging the black President was a sin and would make him un clean to the new pseudo kkk leaders of the GOP. Gov. Crist faced terrible budget woes for Florida so he accepted the stimulus money that saved thousands of Florida jobs. The GOP somehow thinks that this is a bad thing. Now, a punk opportunist who has done nothing for Florida thinks he deserves to be a Senator running on nothing but his hatred of our President. Marco says he did not mis use campaign funds for personal use yet he rushed to pay back the funds after he was exposed. Marco Rubio was for the neo fascist immigration laws before he flip flopped to try to fool the Latino voters of Florida. Marco wants to end Social Security but I am sure he will flip flop on this before November to try to fool the Florida Retiree voters. I will vote Charlie Crist for Senator and Marco Rubio for Dog Catcher.
I think there might be a case to made that Governor Perry knew that varmint was going to be in town that day and his jogging "en garde" was no accident.

Interesting that conservatives screech in horror when Obama talks directly to African Americans and then ignore the purely racial signs denigrating the president at all the Tea Party rallies...

http://www.political-buzz.com/

See Helene. That's why I never like reading anything with your byline. It's the word "meandering."
Obama is not meandering. Did you not get the trip destinations? We who support Obama have been following this amazing tour for the last 2 days including the previous weeking in Asheville. If you do not like following Obama please have the NYT find someone else to give us the news instead of reporting your woes

quote: new law took effect allowing the police to stop and charge suspected illegal immigrants who are not carrying citizenship papers.

if the press can not report the terms of the law correctly, why would we ever believe anything about the rest of the article?

the bill does not allow such profiling

read the bill

all the hate mongers and racists forget

the arizona law that was put in place
1) deffers to federal law
2) specificly requires another law to have been broken before the federal law can be applied

all the arizona bill does is establish the process by which federal law is applied

the federal law establishes who is legal and who is not

to all those who claim this is racist,
remember that seeing everything as racist may be a clue that you are racist
i see enough illegals with all skin colors to know the way the bill is written - there is no race listed

read the bill and find out for yoursef
then you will start finding out who is lying to you

She seems to live just fine with what happened. Now she wants to talk about it? Has she lost any sleep? Now is her chance to sell her book and make some money on this tragedy. Don't buy her book and give the money to charity instead.

To #10, Brian: Could you please explain what Obama's policies are for "rebuilding America for the middle class"? Perhaps you haven't received your new health insurance premium for 2010-2011 yet. I have, and it's not pretty. Couple that with tax increases and next-to-no interest on savings, and I'm trying to figure out how this middle-class person is going to make it.

"In a video to supporters, including members of Organizing for America, the network that played a critical role in his campaign, the president said: “It will be up to each of you to make sure that the young people, African-Americans, Latinos and women, who powered our victory in 2008, stand together once again. "

I guess these are the people Obama represents, clearly not all America. The racism shown by his clear omissions is blatant.
Sorry, I should have said that in 2009, Phoenix, AZ was the number 2 kidnapping captial city in the world, the no. 1 city was Mexico City. Look it up!
What a man that Perry dude is! He can kill a starved canine with his laser gun! Whoopee. I thought they were too busy rewriting history over there.
The Republicans are playing their race card, too. The white one.

1/23/96  Bill Clinton in his State of the Union speech:  “After years ..of neglect, this administration has taken a strong stand to stiffen protection on our borders. We are increasing border patrols by 50 percent; we are increasing inspection to find illegal immigrants in the workplace. And tonight, I announce I will sign an executive order to deny Federal contracts to business that hire illegal immigrants. …We are still a nation of immigrants…But we are also a nation of laws.”
It is time for Attorney General Holder to get involved.

Maintaining perspective is critical here. We do not have months or years available to get to know every single person we come in contact with each day. Here's an easy method for quickly evaluating a person, or even a company, or a product, http://bit.ly/4CmXLG

So far, it appears that George has demonstrated the wisdom to keep his mouth shut, but Laura is apparently going to subject us Americans to more of the "Bush" abuse.  She and he would be more nearly wise (They are both stupid.) to shut up and live behind their respective walls.  RGregory/Boston/Santa Fe
I suggest that the author of this piece check with a dictionary in order to learn the definition of BRAVADO.  Clinton does not act with BRAVADO.  He acts with genuine courage.
I think that U.S. Senator Arlen Specter has done everything he can to bring good jobs to Pennsylvania.
I think that U.S. Senator Arlen Specter will try and do what he thinks is best for the United States Supreme Court and this country.

Arizona passes an immigration law. Texas wants to paddle students in school. These are abhorrent to most of us. But they demonstrate what happens with a frustrated populace. Two steps forward and one back. In America we make mistakes - but is in the nature of the United States of America to self-correct. .......

http://thefiresidepost.com...
I think that the Democrats should vote to re-elect Arlen Specter to the U.S. Senate in 2010.

I guess Obama is trying to make up for stiffing the press so many times but what an odd and mix-up discussion:

" Asked about his views on Goldman Sachs, Mr. Obama said, “I don’t want to comment on a pending case,” but added that most Americans might find some of the behavior of the big financial institutions out of whack with mainstream America."

Clearly commenting on a pending case wasn't a problem when Obama was discussing KSM. But what's even odder is the the slam that the fiscal institutions are "out of whack with mainstream America". My goodness, Congress is "out of whack with mainstream America". Rahm Emanuel is certainly "out of whack with mainstream America". Physician heal thyself.

Gosh I wonder why Obama finally came to the back of the plane to answer questions?  Could it be that Politico busted this White House for their total lack of transparency and access?  HMMMM-guess it worked.  Let's see how long it lasts and if retribution for criticism continues.
